// === START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Todo.cshtml.cs
@page "/todo"
@using TodoList.Blazor.Services
@inject TodoService todoService

<h1>Todo List</h1>

<ul>
    @foreach (var todo in todoService.GetTodoItems())
    {
        <li>@todo</li>
    }
</ul>
// === END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Pages/Todo.cshtml.cs

// === START FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoService.cs
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor.Services
{
    public class TodoService
    {
        private List<string> todoItems;

        public TodoService()
        {
            todoItems = new List<string>
            {
                "Complete task 1",
                "Submit report",
                "Attend meeting"
            };
        }

        public List<string> GetTodoItems()
        {
            return todoItems;
        }
    }
}
// === END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Services/TodoService.cs
